Comments_List: I really gained a greater appreciation for the middle ground that exists between public and private work.  This new knowledge of venture philanthropy has really helped with my interests and world view.
This should be an entire semester's course, not just a half semester.  Otherwise, the only weakness I'd say is the lack of HW assignments, which led many to ignore the assigned readings.
Yes 100%, Dr. Chahine is an incredible professor.
